description: ff. 155. 255 x 173; 165 x 105 mm. 13 lin. Jumādá II, 773. Abridgment of al-Sighnāqīʼs commentary, with marginal glosses, both by the copyist Yūsuf ibn Aḥmad ibn Yūsuf, completed in Cairo, Jumādá II, 773. Incip.: ... اللهم منك نستهدى ... القول فى تسمىة هذا النوع من العلم باصول الفقة
author: Ibn Yūsuf, Yūsuf ibn Aḥmad, 14th cent
title: Mukhtaṣar al-Wafī.
creator: Ibn Yūsuf, Yūsuf ibn Aḥmad, 14th cent
subject: Akhsīkathī, Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad, d. 1247—Muntakhab fī uṣūl al-madhhab
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
